example.title: Pseudocode
example.programlisting: - entry (id: autopsy, headword: autopsy) - sense id: autopsy-1) - headwordTranslation (text: pitva) - example (text: The coroner performed an autopsy.) - headwordMarker: "autopsy" - collocateMarker: "performed" (lemma: perform) - exampleTranslation (text: Koroner provedl pitvu.) - headwordMarker: "pitvu" - collocateMarker: "provedl" (lemma: prov√©st)
